outboundReferences.contextLine: Click the 'Show Graph Visualisation' button on top-right to show a graph visualising the relationships  - which are established by [[wiki-links]] - of your notes. You can even searc your notes and get result nodes highlighted as you search.
If you want to customize the colors of the graph, please check [[override-styles]] for instruction.

inboundReferences.contextLine: - A nice interactive [[graph-view]] visualizing the relationships of your notes.
